info.title: Chart API
info.description: Chart Tax API offers real-time collection of verified federal and state tax records.

get.description: Returns all tax records associated with an `access_token`.
List details about a given tax record.

post.description: Exchange authorization code for access token.

redirect_uri.description: redirect_uri is optional for the embedded SDK flow.

get.description: Get the access token for a taxpayer.

schema.description: The Chart UUID of the taxpayer.

get.description: Return details on all available tax record providers.
Read account information associated with an `access_token`.

post.description: Disconnect one or more `access_token`s from your application.

get.description: Retrieve taxpayer information associated with an `access_token`.
Get the status of a refresh job.

id.description: The Chart UUID of the taxpayer. Returned from the /auth/token endpoint.

metadata.description: Custom metadata identifying external fields about the taxpayer.

analysis.description: Aggregated analysis of the taxpayer's tax situation across all tax records.

name.description: Name of person for whom you are acting (as shown on the tax return)

street.description: Address of person for whom you are acting (number, street)

city.description: City or town, state, and ZIP code

identificationNumber.description: Identification number must be exactly 9 digits and numeric only

decedentSSN.description: SSN must be exactly 9 digits and numeric only

name.description: Name of court (if other than a court proceeding, identify the type of proceeding and name of agency)

city.description: City or town, state, and ZIP code

signatureBase64.description: Base64 encoded signature image. Only supply the base64 string, not the 'data:image/png;base64,' prefix.

form56.description: IRS Form 56 (https://www.irs.gov/pub/irs-pdf/f56.pdf). Only required if the signer of the form 8821 is the fiduciary and not the taxpayer.

id.description: The Chart UUID assigned to this tax record.

name.description: The account name retrieved from tax record provider.

tax_year.description: The tax year of the record.

provider_id.description: The tax record provider associated with the access_token.

date.description: The date of the submission in ISO 8601 format in UTC.

raw_file.description: A pre-signed URL pointing to the raw tax file retrieved from the provider. Returns a PDF file. The URL expires after 12 hours.

forms.description: The parsed tax form data associated with the tax record.

id.description: The id of the tax record provider used in Connect.

display_name.description: The display name of the tax record provider.

icon.description: The url to the official icon of the tax record provider.

logo.description: The url to the official logo of the tax record provider.

primary_color.description: The hex code for the primary color of the tax record provider.

taxpayer_id.description: The Chart UUID identifying the taxpayer for a specific submission.

client_id.description: The client id of the application associated with the `access_token`.

name.description: The account name retrieved from tax record provider.

provider_id.description: The tax record provider associated with the access_token.

metadata.description: Custom metadata identifying external fields about the taxpayer. This is useful for keeping track of external information about the taxpayer such as user IDs from other systems.

firstName.description: Alpha string value with a limit of 50 characters. Only hyphens (-) and spaces are allowed as special characters.

lastName.description: Alpha string value with a limit of 50 characters. Only hyphens (-) and spaces are allowed as special characters.

ssn.description: Full SSN of the taxpayer. Required for non-business form 8821 submissions.

taxId.description: EIN or SSN of the taxpayer

total_liabilities.description: The total tax liabilities of the taxpayer.

withholding_occurred_in_subsequent_year.example: Box not checked no withholding in subsequent year

name.example:
ROBINHOOD MARKETS INC. AS AGENT FOR
ROBINHOOD SECURITIES LLC

offset.example: Not Refund, Credit, or Offset for Trade or Business

half_time_student_indicator.example: Grtr than or Eq to Half Time Student

bearerAuth.description: Please use your access_token returned from the /auth/token endpoint.

clientAuth.description: Please use base64 encoded client_id:client_secret. You can use this command to generate the base64 encoded string: echo -n 'client_id:client_secret' | base64

ChartAPIVersion.name: Chart-API-Version
ChartAPIVersion.description: Header used to specify the version for a given API request. Current version is 2024-01-01.
